jobs.title: ICO Expert
jobs.description:
Are you an ICO expert and have experience in gambling arena and particularly sports betting? Can you help us Launch our ICO project?

We would like to hear from you if you have successfully raised funds in the past for small or large companies and know your way around the 4 stages of the process: 

1. Preparation

2. Pre-ICO

3. ICO

4. Post-ICO

We are a successful group of Casinos in Northern Europe. We have been operating for over 20+ years in the gambling industry.

Ideally we would like someone to be based in the Baltic States, Vilnius, Lithuania, however remote work is also a possibility for the right candidate.

Salary and/or euity will be discussed with the right candidate.
